msg.msgText:
The values of configuration items of "HighAvailability" composite object can be obtained using the "show" option of the "imaserver" command. imaserver show HighAvailability help imaserver show HighAvailability EXAMPLE: imaserver show HighAvailability
The following configuration items are returned:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
